bug.summary: Can't open file path with Chinese character.
bug.description:
Transferred from <denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/issues/4018>http://code.opencv.org/issues/4018</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>|| Shang G on 2014-11-21 02:42 || Priority: Normal || Affected: 2.4.9 (latest release) || Category: highgui-images || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: || PR: || Platform: x86 / Windows </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Can't open file path with Chinese character.</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Platform: Windows 7, Java, IDE:Eclipse. When I use Highgui.imread(filePath), it always returns an empty Mat when the path contains Chinese characters. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>History</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h5>Vadim Pisarevsky on 2015-04-27 15:18</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>- Category set to highgui-images </denchmark-code>
